name: Granadito's first Adventure
description:
Granadito needs some money to save its farm and its family. Suddenly, it appears in a strange room... with money!

Take as much as you can... or not...

(Made with Godot Engine. Fixed some bugs)

Fonts: Cabin Sketch font used under the SIL Open Font License
